title: server metadata accepts leading and trailing whitespaces in key and value pairs

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ashish-chandra

comments.content:
I'm not convinced that metadata munging is appropriate.

Also, you are only allowed to move bugs from New -> Confirmed if you aren't the bug originator. Confirmed means a second person has confirmed it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
